snippet: Airbus won orders for 382 aircraft in the first half, compared to 325 for Boeing. But Airbus delivered 304 planes to Boeing’s 381.
abstract: Airbus says it has won 382 aircraft orders in first half of 2015, beating out American rival Boeing, which says it has won 325 orders in same time frame.
lead_paragraph: Airbus won orders for 382 aircraft in the first half, compared to 325 for Boeing. But Airbus delivered 304 planes to Boeing’s 381.

headline.main: Airbus Beat Boeing on Orders but Fell Behind on Deliveries
headline.print_headline: Airbus Beat Boeing on Orders but Fell Behind on Deliveries
